author: Ramesh Susarla
title: MLA tests negative for COVID-19
description: ‘Being in quarantine not a social stigma’
content:
MLA Abdul Hafeez Khan Mohammed tested negative for COVID-19 on Friday. 
After the announcement of the laboratory result, Mr. Hafeez Khan, in a written appeal to the people, asked them to stop spreading rumours about the spread of the disease as it would crea… [+600 chars]
